title: Episode 20: Conflict Resolution: A Classic Psychological Study
description:
What do gangs, asteroids, a giant octopus and little boys at a summer camp in Robber's Cave State Park in 1954 have in common? Find out this week as we take a look at a wonderful study in psychology...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
content:encoded: What do gangs, asteroids, a giant octopus and little boys at a summer camp in Robber's Cave State Park in 1954 have in common? Find out this week as we take a look at a wonderful study in psychology... Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
itunes:subtitle: We take a look at a wonderful study in psychology which taught us a great deal about intergroup conflict and resolution.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
